body:
Hey guys Ive been recording for a montage im doing and was amazed at this kill, I had no armour and a iron sword and he had a diamond sword with a diamond helmet, and chest plate with iron boots.
#ToGood4You
But flip to 2:20 to see it, and then i get some other good ones, but my montage is going to be BEASTLY Ive gotten crazy fights
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qkoSb3Xm3Ws&feature=youtu.be
You can share your best experiences below

kthxbai

title: Best Kill In Walls?

replies.body: You did have invisibility, which gives you an advantage.
replies.body_tagged: You did have invisibility, which gives you an advantage.

replies.body: Yes but he had way better armour, and sword, if we would of got 1 more khit i wouldve died
replies.body_tagged: Yes but he had way better armour, and sword, if we would of got 1 more khit i wouldve died

replies.body: Invisibility is really OP actually. I have had half diamond and half iron and gotten killed in a 1v1v1 by a stupid invisible dude with speed.

replies.body:
I wouldn't say that that was "One of the Best Kills in the Walls" 
It might have been one of your best kills, but tbh you were kind of being pretty damn rude after you killed him.

replies.body: No we talked over Skype after and played a like 6 walls games after, Well he said f u to me and I don't get how I was that rudee.
